CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
OldVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC environment.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC
OldVersion.description: We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

While rolling out this feature, we detected an issue specifically affecting Outlook on the Web in the Safari browser. Because of this, we have opted to roll back the existing progression to temporarily remove support for Safari. We have now restarted the rollout and support for Safari is planned to be added by mid-2025.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
OldVersion.description: Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights- Copilot for Sales Metrics & PBI Report
CurrentVersion.description: Providing Copilot for Sales metrics for Viva Insights analysts in Advanced insights. Copilot for Sales adoption PBI report to provide a starter template to explore Copilot for Sales adoption across the organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights- Copilot for Sales Metrics & PBI Report
OldVersion.description: Providing Copilot for Sales metrics for Viva Insights analysts in Advanced insights. Copilot for Sales adoption PBI report to provide a starter template to explore Copilot for Sales adoption across the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
OldVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enrich triage in Communication Compliance with Insider Risk context
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators with a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders, along with a more comprehensive view of the sender’s risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enrich triage in Communication Compliance with Insider Risk context
OldVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators with a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders, along with a more comprehensive view of the sender’s risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Notify Users about Hidden Content Matches in Communication Compliance
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is designed to enhance transparency by introducing a notification banner that alerts users when keywords embedded in hidden content, such as hyperlinks or encoded strings, trigger a compliance policy match. With this update, investigators will be able to quickly recognize that some or all keyword matches are not immediately visible in the main content body, saving time and ensuring a more efficient triage experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Notify Users about Hidden Content Matches in Communication Compliance
OldVersion.description: This feature is designed to enhance transparency by introducing a notification banner that alerts users when keywords embedded in hidden content, such as hyperlinks or encoded strings, trigger a compliance policy match. With this update, investigators will be able to quickly recognize that some or all keyword matches are not immediately visible in the main content body, saving time and ensuring a more efficient triage experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
CurrentVersion.description: You can now insert a hyperlink in your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialog box.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
OldVersion.description: You can now insert a hyperlink in your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialog box.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot general availability for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection for the GCC environment is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required).  The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements.  This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot general availability for GCC
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot will be generally available for the GCC environment and will be delivered with web grounding OFF by default. This is required to help protect US government sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset people suggestions in Outlook search for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through settings in the Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. When a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset people suggestions in Outlook search for GCC and DoD
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through settings in the Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. When a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC and DoD. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: New enrollment policies experience for iOS/iPadOS ADE
CurrentVersion.description: These enrollment policies for iOS/iPadOS contains enrollment time grouping, improved UI, and removes automatic deployment of the Company Portal app and deprecated settings.
